name: wdio-course
description: wdio end to end testing project

scripts.test:debug: set DEBUG=Y && set HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.test:demo: set DEBUG=N && set HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.test:smoke: set DEBUG=N && set HEADLESS=Y && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@smoke'

author: Steven Granados (GSGranados)
